subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Talking animals!
author: Robin Searcy Henson
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0057_01C85C80.C7F3EBC0
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

That's too funny!  I actually have an EVP that says "Get outta here."  I wa=
s herding my chickens into the hen house one night and didn't notice the re=
corder was turned on in my pocket.  I don't think any of my animals can spe=
ak human yet.

Robin


  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Frank Sumpti=
on<mailto:franks-boxes@...> 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<mailto:E=
VP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> 
  Sent: Monday, January 21, 2008 9:19 PM
  Subject=
: [EVP-ITC] Talking animals!


  I have gotten our dead dogs on EVP, or thr=
ough the box, but today, as 
  my wife an I were both downstairs, we didn't=
 hear the doorbell as the 
  neighbor kid was ringing it, so being about 7,=
 he just came on in. The 
  smallest Yorkie let out a loud bark, and I swea=
r it said "get outta 
  here". I heard it as plan as any other speech. 

  =
I know, anecdotal evidence. 

  Frank-S
